title: BRIEF-SmartCentres Real Estate Investment Trust Releases First Quarter Results For 2018

organizations.name: brief-smartcentres real estate investment trust releases first

text:
May 9 (Reuters) - SmartCentres Real Estate Investment Trust :
* SMARTCENTRES REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST RELEASES FIRST QUARTER RESULTS FOR 2018
* SMARTCENTRES REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST - QTRLY FFO WITH ONE TIME ADJUSTMENT AND TRANSACTIONAL FFO $0.56 ON A PER UNIT BASIS
